languages.text: As long as the Arch-Militant has killed at least one enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Arch-Militant gains a +{uip|DodgeBonus|c3df77552dee4af28b2fb6c34078fcd6}% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

traits.locale_text: As long as the Veteran has at least one enemy killed with a melee attack this round, the Veteran gains a +<u>(10 + AGI bonus)</u>% bonus to dodge.
As long as the Veteran has killed at least one enemy with a melee attack this round, the Veteran gains a +<u>(10 + AGI bonus)</u>% bonus to dodge.

traits.locale_text: Убив хотя бы одного врага атакой {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}в ближнем бою{/g} в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g}, ветеран получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +<u>(10 + бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g})</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g}.

languages.text: Solange der Erzmilitant mindestens einen Feind mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} getötet hat, und zwar in dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}, erlangt er einen +{uip|DodgeBonus|c3df77552dee4af28b2fb6c34078fcd6} %-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}.
languages.original_text: As long as the Arch-Militant has killed at least one enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Arch-Militant gains a +{uip|DodgeBonus|c3df77552dee4af28b2fb6c34078fcd6}% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Solange der Erzmilitant mindestens einen Feind mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} getötet hat, und zwar in dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}, erlangt er einen +{uip|DodgeBonus|c3df77552dee4af28b2fb6c34078fcd6} %-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}.

So lange der Veteran mindestens einen Feind mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} getötet hat, und zwar in dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}, erlangt er einen +{uip|DodgeBonus|c3df77552dee4af28b2fb6c34078fcd6} %-Bonus auf {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}.

languages.text: Si l'archimilitant élimine au moins un ennemi avec une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} pendant le {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de +{uip|DodgeBonus|c3df77552dee4af28b2fb6c34078fcd6} %.
languages.original_text: As long as the Arch-Militant has killed at least one enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Arch-Militant gains a +{uip|DodgeBonus|c3df77552dee4af28b2fb6c34078fcd6}% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si le Vétéran a éliminé au moins un ennemi avec une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} pendant le {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il obtient un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} de +<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g})</u> %.

Si le Vétéran a éliminé au moins un ennemi avec une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} pendant le {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il obtient un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} de +{uip|DodgeBonus|c3df77552dee4af28b2fb6c34078fcd6} %.

languages.text: Başmilitan, o {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısıyla{/g} en az bir düşmanı öldürdüyse {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değerine +%{uip|DodgeBonus|c3df77552dee4af28b2fb6c34078fcd6} kadar {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazanır.
